channel.title: The revolution { open source } 12800+ views! 8000 dl's
channel.description:
[img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/cooltext94981344.png[/img]
[u][b]This is my first sourse/server release since a very long time.
This is a server what is based off Hiyascape!
There are a lot of new things in it![/b][/u]
[size=20pt]If you have read this, or just watched it, than leave a comment![/size]
[size=13pt]Details:[/size]
- New home - New starter packet (only once) - Clanchat !!!!!!!! [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - Lottery ( Type ::lol for it, you need to have 50 k in your inventory) - Clanwars ! (You can choose out of 2 Teams, You can edit it by yourself, which side of god , etc...)[img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] [size=12pt](This is very cool, to code, also when you are a new coder)[/size] - Minigames (At the moment theire are only 2 minigames in it) - New admin zone [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - GFX - emotes (also client side) - All weapons! (New update) - Perfect ground pickup - Report abuse system - Jailing system ! [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - Slayer house (with workin chest for xp , and NPC's) - Max skill lvl is 99 , combat is 126 ! - A nice beginners outfit - New yell command!! ([Moderator] ….: ….., [Administrator]...:...., [Owner]...:... [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - Pk place - Working ICE-BARRAGE [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - Working Tele's with a counter!!!!!! - Admin zone has a security [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - Normally no lagg! - Cool ::yell command [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/mijn%20game/new.gif[/img] - Working prayer - Emote Tabs
[size=12pt]Here are some Pictures![/size]
Loginscreen [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/Loginscreen.png[/img]
[size=14pt]Clanchat[/size] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/clanchat1.png[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/clanchat2.png[/img]
Clanwars, type ::clanwars [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/clanwars2.png[/img]
Lottery System [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/LotterySystem.png[/img]
The Admin place/zone [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/Adminplace.png[/img] [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/Adminsecurity.png[/img]
Working prayer [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg68/The_predi/Revolution/Revolution%20OPEN/Workingprayer.png[/img]
[size=19pt]If the download link doesn't work, I also have uploaded the file as an attached file! That means that you also can download it from the bottom![/size]
Download link for the server/source http://files.filefront.com/Revolutionrar/;11599388
http://www.mediafire.com/?pfh2m77sxwg
Download link for a good client http://files.filefront.com/The+Revolution+N1rar/;1 (BROKEN)
http://www.mediafire.com/?y4x4elfdzzq (This should work!)
Credits for the server/source: 50 % credits for Maker of Hiyascape 50 % credits for Revolution (ME) and Bulldog God
Credits for the Client: 100 % credits for Ric and Sir roju
[size=20pt]Don't ask for a VIRUS SCAN, because I uploaded the files on Filefront, and he scans the files Automatticly![/size]
[size=25pt]Don't say this is leeched, till you find some prove, what you certainly don't will find![/size]
